content:
Sure! Here are some hands-on and active activities in Barrie, Ontario that might interest your energetic kids:

1. Jump around at Big Fun Play Centre
2. Trampoline Jumping at Flying Squirrel
3. Have fun at Laserforce Laser Tag
4. Try the Ninja Warrior course and other activities at Jump in Trampoline Park
5. Visit the Barrie Area Indoor Playground
6. Go ice-skating at the Barrie Molson Centre.
